title: fusedfolio
author: fusedfolio
content: We have a crypto portfolio tracking service that is in development and we are looking to onboard anyone who may be interested in trying it out. Just send me a private message and let me know the exchanges and network wallets you have and I will get back to you.

comments.author: fusedfolio
comments.body: I have received a couple of requests so far. We are still looking for more users. Anyone onboarded through this process will receive a free service coupon that can be redeemed post-launch.

comments.author: fusedfolio
comments.created_time: November 12, 2022, 11:49:55 PMLast edit: November 13, 2022, 11:55:47 AM by fusedfolio
comments.body: I have decided on sharing the registration link (https://app.fusedfolio.com/register) so that you can sign up directly instead of having to send me a message.Here are a few screenshots of how a typical dashboard may look once you connect your account with your exchanges and wallets.https://ibb.co/t3wW8Cxhttps://ibb.co/N3yH979https://ibb.co/V2mD0CChttps://ibb.co/LQRKGKJ
